extensionDescription.message: This extension enforces safesearch at search engines like Google, Bing and Yahoo

options_ui_settings_desc.message: You can also block access to specific websites through this extension.

options_ui_msg_reset_description.message:
You are bound to reset the extension's settings to its standard values.
This action cannot be undone. Do you want to proceed?

page_ui_welcome_message.message: We recommend you to implement OpenDNS in your organization/domestic network so as to have a complete family protection. With this tool you will be able to control which type of websites should be blocked in your network. Have a look on how to achieve it by clicking in the following link:

page_ui_footer1_desc.message: We would like to invite you to visit our website and check other projects developed by our team (most of them are open source as well).

page_ui_a_alt_footer2_link.description: Alternative text for PayPal donation link

page_ui_footer2_desc.message: Help us keep improving this awesome plugin!

page_ui_footer3_desc.message:
Should you have any trouble/ doubt/ suggestion...
Do not hesitate in getting in touch with us.
Our team is always ready to help you!

page_ui_blocked_message.message: The URL you were trying to access has been blocked by the administrator. If you believe it was a mistake, ask him/her to remove the URL from the blacklist rule.

block_ui_blocklist.message: This website has been blocked by the system administrator. If you believe it was a mistake, please, ask him/her to change the block rules for this URL.
block_ui_blocklist.description: Blockage justification for being on 'block list'

block_ui_over18.message: This page is currently classified as NSFW (+18).

block_ui_cant_check.message: It was not possible to retrieve the website data through API call so as to check the URL safety status.
block_ui_cant_check.description: Blockage justification due to API validation error
